## fit1101 variable

Inline function. Fits value `x` in \[-1..+1\] interval to \[0..1\] interval. No clamping performed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fit1101: <T extends Prim>(x: Term<T>) => Op2<T>
```
